verbs.description: [ARG0: Ya] [V: know] , I really miss Anthony Scaramucci sometimes . Especially when you contrast his flamboyant , over the top enthusiasm for Trump to the serious , almost spiteful Josef Goebbels like pronouncements ...

[ARGM-DIS: Ya] know , [ARG0: I] [ARGM-ADV: really] [V: miss] [ARG1: Anthony Scaramucci] [ARGM-TMP: sometimes] . [ARGM-TMP: Especially when you contrast his flamboyant , over the top enthusiasm for Trump to the serious , almost spiteful Josef Goebbels like pronouncements] ...

Ya know , I really miss Anthony Scaramucci sometimes . Especially [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: you] [V: contrast] [ARG1: his flamboyant , over the top enthusiasm for Trump] [ARG2: to the serious , almost spiteful Josef Goebbels like pronouncements] ...
